verses.text: And when the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of the \w fame|strong="H8088"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* with hard \w questions|strong="H2420"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w company|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: and when she was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, she \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with him of all that was in her \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her all her \w questions|strong="H1697"\w*: and there was nothing \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* which he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her not.

And when the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that he had \w built|strong="H1129"\w*,

And the \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* of his \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and the \w sitting|strong="H4186"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and the \w attendance|strong="H4612"\w* of his \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w*, and their \w apparel|strong="H4403"\w*; his \w cupbearers|strong="H8248"\w* also, and their \w apparel|strong="H4403"\w*; and his \w ascent|strong="H5944"\w* by which he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; there was no more \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in her.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft cupbearers: or, butlers\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add It was\add* a \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w report|strong="H1697"\w* which I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in mine own \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of thine \w acts|strong="H1697"\w*, and of thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*:\f + \fr 9.5 \ft report: Heb. word\f*\f + \fr 9.5 \ft acts: or, sayings\f*

Howbeit I \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* not their \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, until I \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it:\add* and, behold, the one \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w greatness|strong="H4768"\w* of thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* was not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* me: \add for\add* thou \w exceedest|strong="H3254"\w* the \w fame|strong="H8052"\w* that I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* thy \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* these thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, which \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* be the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* in thee to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: because thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w establish|strong="H5975"\w* them for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, therefore \w made|strong="H5414"\w* he thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over them, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*.

And she \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and of \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: neither was there any such \w spice|strong="H1314"\w* as the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

And the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* also of \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w*, and the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, which \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* from \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w algum|strong="H0418"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.\f + \fr 9.10 \ft algum…: also called, almug trees\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \add of\add* the \w algum|strong="H0418"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w terraces|strong="H4546"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* and \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* for \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: and there were none \w such|strong="H1992"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft terraces: or, stairs: Heb. highways\f*

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* all her \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*, whatsoever she \w asked|strong="H7592"\w*, beside \add that\add* which she had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. So she \w turned|strong="H2015"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w* to her own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, she and her \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

¶ Now the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* was \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*;

Beside \add that which\add* \w chapmen|strong="H0582"\w* and \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*. And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w* and \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.\f + \fr 9.14 \ft governors: or, captains\f*

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w targets|strong="H6793"\w* \add of\add* \w beaten|strong="H7820"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w beaten|strong="H7820"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w target|strong="H6793"\w*.

And \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \add made he of\add* \w beaten|strong="H7820"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Moreover the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* to the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, with a \w footstool|strong="H3534"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add which were\add* \w fastened|strong="H0270"\w* to the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and \w stays|strong="H3027"\w* on each side of the \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w stays|strong="H3027"\w*:\f + \fr 9.18 \ft stays: Heb. hands\f*

And \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* there on the one side and on the other upon the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*. There was not the like \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in any \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

¶ And all the \w drinking|strong="H4945"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \add were of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \add were of\add* \w pure|strong="H5462"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: none \add were of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; it was \add not\add* \w any|strong="H3972"\w* thing \w accounted|strong="H2803"\w* of in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.\f + \fr 9.20 \ft pure: Heb. shut up\f*\f + \fr 9.20 \ft none were of silver: or, there was no silver in them\f*

For the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* with the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w*: every \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w once|strong="H0259"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* \w bringing|strong="H5375"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w ivory|strong="H8143"\w*, and \w apes|strong="H6971"\w*, and \w peacocks|strong="H8500"\w*.\f + \fr 9.21 \ft ivory: or, elephants’ teeth\f*

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w passed|strong="H1431"\w* all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

¶ And all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w present|strong="H4503"\w*, \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w raiment|strong="H8008"\w*, \w harness|strong="H5402"\w*, and \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*, a \w rate|strong="H1697"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w stalls|strong="H0723"\w* for \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*; whom he \w bestowed|strong="H3240"\w* in the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And he \w reigned|strong="H4910"\w* over all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* even unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and to the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft river: that is, Euphrates\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* as \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and cedar \w trees|strong="H0730"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* he as the sycomore \w trees|strong="H8256"\w* that \add are\add* in the low \w plains|strong="H8219"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 9.27 \ft made silver: Heb. gave silver\f*
And they \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and out of all \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and in the \w prophecy|strong="H5016"\w* of \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w Shilonite|strong="H7888"\w*, and in the \w visions|strong="H2378"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H3260"\w* the \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* against \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*?\f + \fr 9.29 \ft book: Heb. words\f*
And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and he was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
